text: ●Use face masks – The sick person should wear a face mask when they are in the same room as other people. If you are caring for the sick person, you can also protect yourself by wearing a face mask when you are in the room.

domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations
